testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it. See what our clients have to say about working with us.

quotes.first: Working with the Agency Digital team was an excellent experience. They delivered our e-commerce platform ahead of schedule and the results exceeded our expectations in terms of user engagement and sales conversion.
quotes.second: The website redesign completely transformed our brand image. We've seen a 40% increase in inquiries and our bounce rate has significantly decreased. Highly recommend their services!
quotes.third: Their mobile app development skills are unmatched. Our delivery app has received outstanding reviews on both App Store and Google Play. The user experience is intuitive and the performance is flawless.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: At Agency Digital, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
introduction.p2: Please read this privacy policy carefully before using our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.p1: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows:

items.personal: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, company name, and job title.
items.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you use our website and services.
items.technical: Technical Data: Internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting, browser plug-in types and versions, operating system and platform.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.p1: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:

items.provide: To provide and maintain our services.
items.improve: To improve and personalize our services.
items.communicate: To communicate with you about our services, including sending updates and marketing materials.
items.security: To monitor and analyze the use of our services and detect, prevent and address technical issues.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
cookies.p2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our services.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.p1: Our service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.p1: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

rights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
rights.p1: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to:

items.access: Request access to your personal data.
items.rectification: Request correction of your personal data.
items.erasure: Request erasure of your personal data.
items.restrict: Request restriction of processing your personal data.
items.portability: Request the transfer of your personal data.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: Welcome to Agency Digital. These Terms of Use govern your use of our website and the services we provide.
introduction.p2: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access our services.

use.title: Use of Our Services
use.p1: Our services are intended for users who are at least 18 years old. By using our services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old.

items.license: License: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our services for your personal or business purposes.
items.restrictions: Restrictions: You may not use our services for any illegal purposes or in any manner that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our services.
items.modifications: Modifications: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, our services with or without notice.

content.title: Content on Our Website
content.p1: Our website may contain content that is provided by us, our users, or third parties. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of any content on our website.
content.p2: We are not responsible for any loss or damage that may result from your reliance on such content.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.p1: When you create an account with us, you must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
accounts.p2: You are responsible for safeguarding the password that you use to access our services and for any activities or actions under your password.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.p1: Our services and all content included on our website, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, are the property of Agency Digital or its content suppliers and protected by international copyright laws.

items.copyright: Copyright: All content included on our website is the property of Agency Digital or its content suppliers and protected by international copyright laws.
items.trademarks: Trademarks: All trademarks, service marks, and trade names used on our website are the property of their respective owners.
items.use: Use of Content: You may not use, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from any content on our website without our prior written consent.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.p1: By posting content on our website, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable, sub-licensable, worldwide license to use, display, reproduce, and distribute such content in connection with our services.
userContent.p2: You represent and warrant that you own or have the necessary rights to the content you post on our website, and that the posting of your content does not violate any copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property rights.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.p1: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information. By using our services, you agree to our

termination.title: Termination
termination.p1: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms of Use.
termination.p2: Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease. If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using our services.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: In no event shall Agency Digital, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use our services.
liability.p2: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, the total liability of Agency Digital and its affiliates, for any claims under these terms, including for any implied warranties, is limited to the amount you paid us to use our services.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.p1: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms of Use at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us:

form.briefingInstructions: Fill out the form below to tell us about your project. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.sendBriefingEmail: Send me project updates via email
form.preferPhone: Call me to discuss the project details
